English.Text: Tragic youthful over-exuberance. Your sailors drain a bottle of strong rum before going back out, perhaps believing machismo will keep them warm. They batten the hatches in the white flurry, stumbling, belching and laughing. The hilarity continues when one of the lads slips and loses his feet, that is until the steel rim of the funnel meets his head with a clomp. He dies instantly.
